plot: While the survivors gather at the Candlewick, Chloe and Abby help Cal to patch up the sheriff. Shane turns up to taunt the group, but Henry arrives in time to stop him. Jimmy gives Henry some critical papers from JD's pocket which lead Abby to question her own paternity. When Beth disappears, the friends search a tunnel network beneath the inn. Henry and Jimmy need Shane's truck to rescue Abby, but the vehicle is swiped by Trish and Shea. The sheriff disappears from Cal's care; Madison's recovery throws new suspicion on someone close to Abby.—Anonymous

JD's killing at the marina spreads renewed fear around. The fainting sheriff and papers found in JD's pocket fitting a partially burnt journal ultimately make Aby realize that she may be the key, as her mother had an adulterous child, probably her. Even Sully, who decided against sneaking off the island, now openly questions her role. Shane is brought to the fold by prime suspect JD's death, so henry can assume charge. Only Trish, who agreed to wait for the state police, sneaks off by stealing Shane's truck. Meanwhile the boys and Abby find and penetrate a tunnel system from the Prohibition era. Splitting up inside, they find Beh's corpse and the room where Madison stayed, according to her told her abduction was a game.—KGF Vissers
